channel.title: Recoding Slayer Skill
channel.description:
Ok im recoding the slayer skill and i have a couple Questions about the If statements
Iv been using this for most of the code [code]c.combatLevel[/code]
I want to change that so that its this [code]c.slayerLevel[/code] (Reason is so that better your slayer level better monsters you can kill & so slayer isnt based on combat)
When i use [code]c.slayerLevel[/code] i get a symbal error. idk what this mean. im not sure what to do. Please help
